title: can anyone gift me yasuo please
body: hello, yasuo is one of my favorite champions in the game but i don't  have a lot of money. could any of gift him to me?{{champion:157}}

replies.body: Yeah sure. I'll need to know a few things first, what's your password? Also, if you have a bank account, I'll definitely need to know ALL of it's details!
^ Probably just the bank account will do. He needs it so they know who he is donating for
Go mow some lawns for a few bucks or something. Far out
